reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: first time in the kanali went for 2wks 10th june 2011 what a friendly, genuine,helpful bunch they are would do anything for u we hated leaving them all nikos, kelly, spiros, george and perry and everyone connected with the kanali. we ate in the aquarius all but once coz it woz so good our room was big and cleaners wer in everyday. the entertainment was good nikos and his band who i had the greaaaaat opportunity to sing with wer brill and they had the greek nite n quiz nite also a frank sinatra/michael buble tribute the nite b4 we left which woz good oops nearly forgot and karaoke not a bad word can be said about this place and cant wait to go back truly so luv too all miss u aha xxxxx
reviews.title: it was so sad to leave this place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: From the first time that we had stop in the area..everything was good! most people were so kind and friendly with us ! we had a beautiful room with amazing view !! Nikos was very helpful !! Spiros & the team (kelly, george)from the restaurant was fantastic...we felt like we were at home !! We enjoyed the greek night & the live night, nikos & his rock band was fantastic!!!!! You should go to see them even if you finally stay somewhere else !!The food at the restaurant was tasty and excellent. you should try one of the homemade foods by spiro's mother like kleftiko or mousaka! I The only problem we had in sidari is some travel agents like vlaseros travel & nsk we tried to booked some trips ,to save our money from the reps( so expensive!!!), but in the end they asked us more money from the pricelist that they have given (hidden extras)Thank god we didn't pay anything so we left !! finaly we discovered another travel office....corfiot holidays & tours and it's so close with the hotel !!!. i suppose is the only office with original full prices. The team was truly helpful and polite. we had a fantastic tour Paleo & bella vista and horse riding !! We have Discovered that Dimitris the boss is niko's brother , actually they are like twins (haha)and he used to work for kanali hotel some years before ,!! So we just want to say, you have to be very careful if you are interesting to book any trips .We made a lot of friends and we still have contact from facebook. We will come back and summer 2012 !!! Niko, Spiro,Kelly ,George, Dimitri & Gemma Thanks all of you !!! Kisses !!
reviews.title: Amazing!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Just returned back after stopping at the kanali and the hotel was lovely and clean. the views are amazing. The food was lovely and the staff were all very helpful. It was such a shame to see so many bars/tavernas closed down but that is the euro for you. We went in a lovely bar called the Saxaphone really beautiful but was very disappointed one night after going in there late and the bar staff trying to rip us off by not giving us our change thinking we had given her a 5 euro when in fact it was a 20 so be aware check your change! Lovely holiday and was very sad to come home. Would certainly stop at the Kanali again.
reviews.title: very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011
reviews.text: I am sat typing this from the main reception of kanali hotel while waiting for our transfer to the airport. The kanali has a reputation as the best hotel in the area along with the aquarias bar/restaurant and I have to say it more than lives up to it! The rooms are spot on and the facilities such as free wifi, free safety deposit box and shower room are very nice unexpected extras. the staff are fantastic and work very hard to ensure you want for nothing and enjoy every minute of yor stay! Nikos in the hotel, Spiros and George in the restaurant all go above and beyond. The food is amazing and very good value, you will find it hard to eat anywhere else! The views cannot be beaten and it is in the absoutly best location to access the busier part of sidari if you wish!
reviews.title: Magical! :)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We hope to return in September and will definitely be back next June!
reviews.title: Kanali is the best place in the world

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got back on Friday and we stayed on the first floor room 204 there is a lift which is great for getting your cases to rooms and you all get free use of a safety deposit box. We had a two bedroom apartment and it was spotless (the cleaners come in every day), we found our apartment very comfortable, nice double bed, all your kitchen equipment and the best showers we have ever had in any accommodation in Greece and then there is the view, it is so beautiful you would never get tired looking at that view, just incredible.
reviews.title: Fantastic Kanali Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nikos who is in charge of the Kanali is one of the nicest guys you will ever meet and nothing is too much bother for him. As well as making sure our accommodation is spot on he also plays at the Aquarius restaurant with his rock band and really is amassing.
reviews.title: "Absolutely the Best"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a nice pool surrounded by free sunbeds, also sunbeds in the little bay bellow the hotel.
reviews.title: First Rate Establishment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The Aquarius restaurant is next to the pool and serves food and drink from 8.30 am until very late. The food here is really good , we went to the BBQ night, Quiz night, Greek night and the Rock band and had a great time at all of them and we were so surprised the Greek and Rock nights were so professional we would have been happy to paid to see them.
reviews.title: Liz & Rick Doncaster

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But the thing that made our holiday so great was Spiros Kelly George and Peri who all worked so hard at the restaurant and made us feel so at home anything you want they will get for you. They along with their children who we were lucky enough to meet all made our holiday fantastic and we love them all.
reviews.title: margaret an ian york

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my huband just returned yesterday from Kanali,what a great two weeks. Room 310 pool & sea view with 2 small beautiful coves two minutes down the stair by the pool.The" treasure" A postcard picture landscape to see sun rise or sun down right there in our view. The apartment had all the needs for your holiday when self catering a fridge,oven /hob,fridge,kettle toaster. The beds were firm but we slept great considering we have the allegedly comfy memory mattress.The maid's were polite & friendly rooms are kept very clean. There is a library,pool room,wi-fi access just above the Aquarius.The Aquarius restaurant had good food at reasonable prices and as a plus you have a breathtaking seaview of Canal D'Amour, or if you want you can have your food in your room or at the pool.If you are in Corfu just now or booked for another appartment why not have a breakfast, lunch or dinner and see for yourself the standard.They have entertainment night's we went to two, a great Greek night ( a lovely,friendly proportion dance routine one that doesn't drag on forever) which you could tie up with dinner ,or Niko's Rock band which is another great night,the guy can play guitar,beware you got to book early|Ask to see a room I'm sure the lovely Niko's could arrange it ,if there were any rooms left empty!The surrounding gardens are well kept. The pool and surrounding area are also kept lovely & clean.You are a 10 minute stroll from Sidari main strip & beach.Great water sports and boats,we just spectated.NSK. travel excursions has an honest rep. with good service if you are going on excursions. We were on the two island cruise and saw two dolphins, how lucky were we!....but it was so unexpected and we could hardly take our eye's off them by the time we got our camera & camcorder out we were too late to get any photos or film. So I would advise when you go on any boat trip have the camera at the ready it was the same girl when we were there three year ago.The "diamonds" in the treasure,are the staff,we have never experienced the service that the staff at Kanali & Aquarius delivered on any holiday we have been on,they are so genuinely friendly & professional from arrival to departure it was a great holiday.
reviews.title: Kanali - a Corfu treasure chest

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from our fourth trip to Kanali and it was fantastic! Thomsons may rate this aparthotel as a three star, but the Kanali has a 5 star heart. We had a studio apartment on the third floor, it was immaculate and with new shower cubicles. The maids are delightful and friendly and came in every day. Nikos the hotel manager is so friendly and manages the reception with style..!! He greets every arrival and whether you are new to the Kanali or not, everyone is treated as though they are the only guests. The views from the Kanali are exceptional and the surrounding areas are full of well tended flowers and grass areas.
reviews.title: Excellent...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The 'Team Kanali/Aquarius' is made up of Nikos, Spiros, Kelly, Georges and Peri (and mama Helena) - I go back to 5 star, because a holiday is about the experience and these guys are first class at the 'holiday experience' they remember your names, greet you affectionately and at the Aquarius, the food is first class.
reviews.title: A delightful, relaxing holiday.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have travelled all over Europe, Scandinavia and the Mediterrean (in the travel industry and for pleasure) and I have to say I have never experienced such professional and friendly service
reviews.title: Kanali - deserves it's 4.5 score
I agree
reviews.text: which they deliver from the heart.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well,were do we start!!..met by Nikos,who took our baggage up to our room,nice touch.He showed us round the apartment,pulled back the curtains & wow!...the view was beautiful, what a stunning sight.The apartment was roomy,spotlessly clean & all the facilities you could need,the only slight complaint was the curtains in the rooms were thin which allowed too much light, especially in the mornings. Nikos is aware of this and has plans for thicker curtains for the near future,hardly worth mentioning but some people like dark rooms! Other than that we had the perfect Holiday.The staff were brilliant, and extremely friendly, from the maids to management.. I would totally recommend the Kanali.Thanks guys we had a wonderful time!! Also worth a mention is sidari itself, which was just perfect for its choice of tavenas, restaurants and shopping, now where too noisy, or peace and tranquillity could easily be found if needed. Wonderful place.
reviews.title: Wow!!...A gem!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: For what we paid for a weeks break we were very happy. The apartments were clean and tidy with fabulous sea views. The staff were friendly and helpful and the facilities good. We were happy to be in the uieter area of Sidari but the main bit was a short 20 minute walk.
reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a fantastic week ,staying at Kanali Apartments,it was our first time in this area of Corfu and we were really impressed with the accomodation ,the view from our apartment ,overlooking the sea was wonderful and the staff were so friendly and helpful. Many of the guests have returned several times and I could understand why ,it is suitable for family groups or couples ,we certainly hope to go back before too long.
reviews.title: Good accomodation in a good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have not done a Tripadvisor review before despite having travelled the world over. Normally you would expect good service and ok facilities, it is what travel copmanies have made thier name on, and so poor service or accomodation are rare events these days. so why review the Kanali Appartments as my first blog? - Simply the people. From Nickos who gets the bags, ( and owns it and is one of the best Guitar players I have had the privalige to hear!!) to Spiros, George and the whole family restaurant team, who want to help and exude friendship, this is a family concern with the extra mile guarenteed. The appartments are good for 3 star, but not luxorious although cleaned very well each day. The location is amazing - but I guess that depends on what you like? Right on the beach with postcard views, clear blue sea and only one or two people on the beach to share the experience with ( only been in sept and May - so may be different in August!).
reviews.title: Sublime

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Sidari is a little bit complex as a resort. It is full of brash (but good) bars on the main strip, with tribute bands and cheap coctails, but that is only part of the Sidari story. There are also lots ( 10 plus) of good traditional greek Tavernas with amazingly good food for a small town, without bigging up the Kanali, the Aquarius is on of the best in town. Sidari is not too glitzy, but has a truth and authenticity which despite the razmataz shines through. It is a rough diamond, but still a diamond.
reviews.title: Just had the most fantastic holiday at the Kanali Hotel Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: This was our second stay, the previous year was our first, and hopefully it won't be our last! Kanali Hotel is such a wonderful place, I really couldn't fault it. Our room, even though basic, was ALWAYS clean and tidy and the view from our big balcony could have been off a postcard! The location was perfect, right on the sea front, close to all the shops, restaurants and bars but far away enough to get a good nights sleep. The staff were AMAZING and they were the main reason we went back, they were all so welcoming and friendly. By the second night they could remeber all of our names and would be happy chat, have a joke and give us tourist information. I had my 21st birthday while I was over there and they decorated the restaurant with balloons and banners and went out of their way to make it a very special evening. The swimming pool area is very nice too, the pool is big and clean and there are lots of sun beds, both by the pool and on a nice grass area to the side. Also the food from their restaurant 'Aquarius' is top quality, we ate there almost every night! The best food we found for miles around and at very good prices too. We hope to be back soon!
reviews.title: Our second stay and hopefully not the last!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I have been going to The Kanali for two years and have booked to go back again this year (2011). The Kanali is beautifully situated overlooking the sea towards Albania. The views from the balcony are just stunning. The studios/apartments are extremely clean and the towels and bedding are changed regularly. The studio we had was well equipped - fridge, cooking utensils, mini oven, kettle etc and there was a hairdryer (one less item to carry abroad!). On arrival you are met, usually by Nikos at the bottom of the lane and he drives your suitcases up to the apartments - it is only a short walk to them. The Kanali is situated in the Canal D'Amour area and it is only a 10-15 minutes walk ( unless you get diverted, as we often did, to Jeni's Cafe which sells the most amazing cheesecake and a coffee or beer - she also makes great sandwiches and if you call in before you go on a trip around Corfu, she will make some up for you) to the main Sidari strip where there are a host of bars, restaurants and shops.
reviews.title: Excellent Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As with most Greek apartments you will have to buy your own loo rolls, but this is readily available at the mini supermarket at the end of the road. To the left hand side of the apartments there is the pool which is extremely clean, it also has a kiddies paddling pool. Again the views from the pool were lovely, looking directly over the sea with Albania in the distance. There is never any rush for the sun beds either.
reviews.title: Spectacular Views - Hidden Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Aquarius Restaurant and bar ( right by the pool) is absolutely fantastic, when Spiros opens the big glass doors it is a truly stunning view directly overlooking the sea and the bay. This restaurant is open to anyone (not just Kanali guests). The food is truly amazing and freshly cooked. The menu is varied (Greek, Italian, English etc.) with lots to choose from. We had the Greek menu every night (try their greekburger filled with feta cheese with the local Mythos beer!! and the moussaka is to die for.....) Nikos and his band played a 60's/70's night in the upstairs bar (once a week) he was really good... The Greek Night was also very good as was the barbeque. Spiros, Georges, Nikos and families were exceptional. Their customer service is second to none and nothing was too much trouble. Even if you are staying elsewhere in Sidari, you really must try the Aquarius Restaurant, I think it is the best in Sidari.
reviews.title: sorry but no thanks!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Kanali apartments are highly recommended by us and we are really looking forward to seeing Nikos, Spiros, Georges and families again...Yammas guys!
reviews.title: Excellent !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Everything we read in trip advisor before booking is true . Smashing apartments and swimming pool with great views .
reviews.title: A GREAT TIME

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Their restaurant ,Aquarius , is a few strides away and is a great place to eat .
reviews.title: Kanali - A crazy little thing called love

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Their own rock band on Wednesday's is something else.
reviews.title: Fantastic Kanali

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lounge by the pool on free sunloungers and stroll from there for a dip in the sea , just one minute away .
reviews.title: Once again a great hollidy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012
reviews.text: All the staff are very friendly and cannot do enough for you .
reviews.title: Best place in greece

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All previous reviews are spot on , the hotel the staff and location are great. All you have to do is go and see for yourself,you will not regret it. The purpose of these reviews are to inform, read them all make your decision then go !!! The Daves
reviews.title: Simply the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Moved to these apartments after booking to stay at Sunshine Resort (not sunshine studios) however it was an awful and we moved within 2 hours, we were very lucky that we managed to get a room at Kanali,we were travelling as a couple but the only room they had left that week was a 2 bedroom family room. (307) very spacoius with lovely views.
reviews.title: Amazing!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: When we arrived Niko's couldn't have been more helpful, helped carry our suitcase's upto our room and showed us around.
reviews.title: I challenge anyone to beat this place in Sidari- what a holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was tidyed and beds were made for us everyday. Clean towels and bedsheets were changed twice during our week's stay.
reviews.title: We didn't want to come home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011
reviews.text: The large pool and resturant had amazing views over the sea and Canal d'Amour. All staff are very friendly, Spiro and Geroge make you feel like family. The Greek night was great entertainment.
reviews.title: Perfect Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This was our third visit ,what lucky people we are ! . What makes these excellent apartments are the staff , so to Nikos,Spiros, Kelly, Perry, and George , plus all of the other staff who do a fatastic job,a very big thank you. I know this website is to give my views on the the accommodation but frankly they are not number 1 for nothing. All I can say is that the only way to confirm most other people's impressions is to go for yourself and enjoy. The Daves will return ! .
reviews.title: Don't tell anyone else please
Going back
reviews.text: Had a great time this year just booked for next year that says it all

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Well where do we start?
reviews.title: Our perfect 2012 holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cannot find fault with the kanali apartments and if you don't have time to read my review below ......................based on previous stays in sidari at so called 3 star hotel, this should be up in the 5 star catorgorie!
reviews.title: Back for more!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ROOMS-nice and spacious,2 bedroom apartments,both bedrooms have 2 bedside cabinets,dressing table with stool and mirror, tv with news channel,weather channel and a movie channel, large double patio doors leading out to a lovely patio with table,chairs and washing lines. The view from the patio is stunning! I challenge anyone to get a better view anywhere in the whole of Greece. Fantastic views of the rock, the sea and albania!
reviews.title: best holiday
